  <strong style="display: block;">Which of the following actions would typically decrease a firm’s equity beta, holding all else constant?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module4_mcq_q9" value="C"> C. Increasing the firm's operating leverage</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module4_mcq_q9" value="D"> D. Taking on projects with higher correlation to market returns</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module4_mcq_q9" value="E"> E. Increasing cash holdings relative to total assets</label><br>
</form>
